jobs_results.title: iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
One of our direct client is urgently looking for iOS Developer @ Bentonville AR

TITLE : iOS Developer

LOCATION: Bentonville AR

Duration: 6 to 12+ Months

Rate: DOE

Note:

iOS Developer for First Mile Delivery

Development of iOS applications and their integration with back-end services. You will be working alongside other engineers and developers working on different layers of the infrastructure. Therefore, a commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and the creation of quality products is essential.

Responsibilities -
â€¢ Design and build e-commerce applications for the iOS platform
â€¢ Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications
â€¢ Collaborate with a team to define, design, and ship new features
â€¢ Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs
â€¢ Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization
â€¢ Lead and mentor junior developers Skills
â€¢ Expert in iPhone SDK, SQLite Database, iPad, X Code, XML-JSON Parsing
â€¢ Location services, Social networking integration like Facebook ,twitter
â€¢ Expert in Objective C programming & Swift 3, Web service and Parsing JSON/XML.
â€¢ Expertise in iPhone development, including implementing applications with standard iPhone/ iPad UI components, creating custom UI.

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
About Haneke Design:

We are a custom software development firm in downtown Tampa, FL, looking to expand our team with individuals who will help us fortify our mission: to deliver digital experiences that amaze and delight.

Our clients range from early stage start-ups to Fortune 500 companies, but we always keep a strong focus on user experience. We believe that we can achieve the best results when our designers and developers collaborate from the start.

Our team is passionate about keeping up with the pace of our ever-evolving industry, so we are looking for those who are just as bored by the status quo and just as excited about the cutting edge as we are.

About the Position:

As a Swift Mobile App Developer, you will work with our development team to create and maintain custom mobile apps for our clients, and will collaborate with our design team to proactively identify areas of risk and propose possible solutions.

Responsibilities/Requirements:
â€¢ Knowledge of Swift/iOS development
â€¢ Understanding of Swift/iOS best practices
â€¢ Understanding of the of App Store
â€¢ Ability to translate client inspiration into solid requirements
â€¢ Proficiency with GitHub/ Bitbucket or other version control systems
â€¢ Strong problem-solving and communication skills

Understanding of the of App Store

Strong problem-solving and communication skills

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer - Mid Level
jobs_results.description:
About the position

Care.com is a consumer tech company dedicated to solving the challenge of finding quality care for loved ones. Our mission is rooted in understanding the needs of families, as we are parents and caregivers ourselves. We are currently seeking a Mid-Level iOS Developer to join our engineering team, which is focused on reimagining our technology stack and consolidating it into a single cloud-native platform. This platform utilizes modern technologies such as gRPC microservices, Lambdas in Go, Kafka streams, DynamoDB, Elasticsearch, GraphQL, and micro-frontends built on Node and React. We are committed to employing industry best practices and tools like OpenTelemetry, Splunk, Github, and SignalFX to enhance our development processes. As an iOS Developer, you will be part of a team responsible for developing native iOS and Android solutions for our engaged member base. Your role will involve designing, implementing, and refining code, as well as building polished user interfaces that interact with a feature-rich RESTful web service. You will have the opportunity to create elegant UI designs with tasteful animations and transitions, all while adhering to a thoughtful Pattern Library. This position also emphasizes continuous learning and improvement, allowing you to mentor and lead others as you grow in your role. Collaboration is key, and you will engage with other developers, product managers, creative teams, QA, and marketing within an Agile framework.

Responsibilities
â€¢ Develop native iOS and Android solutions for an engaged member base.
,
â€¢ Design, implement, and mature code for mobile applications.
,
â€¢ Build polished user interfaces that interact with RESTful web services.
,
â€¢ Create elegant UI designs with tasteful animations and transitions.
,
â€¢ Mentor and lead team members while continuously improving your skills.
,
â€¢ Collaborate with developers, product managers, creative teams, QA, and marketing in an Agile environment.

Requirements
â€¢ 3+ years of experience building mobile applications.
,
â€¢ Mastery of iOS Frameworks and Swift, with working knowledge of Objective C.
,
â€¢ Ability to design simple, clear, and flexible solutions without over-designing.
,
â€¢ Strong focus on quality in user experiences and code.
,
â€¢ Experience as a main developer on one or more apps over a multi-year period.
,
â€¢ Solid understanding of Object Oriented Programming, design patterns, algorithms, and data structures.
,
â€¢ Intuitive understanding of mobile constraints and patterns to overcome them.
,
â€¢ Well organized, detail-oriented, and effective communicator.

Nice-to-haves

Benefits
â€¢ Health insurance coverage
,
â€¢ Life and disability insurance
,
â€¢ Generous 401K employer matching program
,
â€¢ Paid holidays
,
â€¢ Paid time off (PTO)

jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
Job Title: Senior iOS Developer

Experience: 10+ Years

Skills: iOS, SDK, C, Mapkit and REST API

Location: Fort Mill, SC

We at Coforge are hiring Senior iOS Developer with the following skillset:

Technical skills
â€¢ Strong knowledge in Objective C, Swift, and iOS SDK.
â€¢ Good understanding of software development best practices.
â€¢ Hands on expertise in any one of the cross-platform technologies like React Native/Flutter.
â€¢ Solid understanding of the mobile eco-system, hands on experience in writing memory and network optimized code.
â€¢ Experience with third-party libraries and APIs.
â€¢ Experience in REST API Third party libraries like AFNetworking, Alamofire.
â€¢ Strong understanding of Design Patterns.
â€¢ Proficient with iOS technologies including Core Data, Core Location, MapKit, Grand Central Dispatch and Auto Layout.
â€¢ Experience with Offline Storage, Threading, And Performance Tuning.
â€¢ Good analytical, problem solving and troubleshooting skills.
â€¢ Knowledge of Android is a plus.

Roles & Responsibilities:
â€¢ The candidate will be responsible for developing rich native applications using iOS and Cross platform technologies.
â€¢ Contribute to the analysis, design & development of features as a strong individual contributor.
â€¢ Carry out code reviews and suggest better solutions for a scalable architecture.
â€¢ Ability to multitask and manage multiple priorities and commitments concurrently.
â€¢ Translate designs and wireframes into high quality code.
â€¢ Understand requirements, understand existing features, design and architect solutions.
â€¢ Desire to keep up with the latest trends, innovations, and opportunities in mobile development and apply trends to current projects.
â€¢ Collaborate with team members to brainstorm about new solutions, provide each other with technical insight and review working drafts.
â€¢ Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
â€¢ Should be able to work in agile mode.

jobs_results.title: IOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
Adidev Technologies Inc

www.adidevtechnologies.com

Adidev Technologies is looking for entry and mid-level IOS developers with at least 1 - 2 years of experience. Must be open to working onsite, no telecommuting/remote positions are being offered. Must be a driven self starter and must be willing to relocate to a new city or state depending upon the client assignment. This position requires relocation, projects can last anywhere from 6 months to 18 months with options to extend. The salary varies depending on experience and we are in search of developers looking to start as soon as possible. Must have excellent written and oral communication and work well in a team environment.

If you are looking for a new challenge and are ready to make an impact on a growing team, then this will be a perfect fit. As an Android Mobile Developer for Adidev Technologies Inc., you will be enhancing and debugging large-scale applications for our well-known clients.

Adidev Technologies is a growing software consulting company that is ready to expand. Working with well-known clients and ready to take on new ones, we need to add more brilliant software engineers to the team to make this possible. Not only do we offer a great team to work with, but we also offer you an opportunity to make an immediate impact and get rewarded accordingly

iOS:
â€¢ Hands-on experience in Swift, Unit test automation, Agile, GitHub, and Objective-C.
â€¢ Experience with iOS frameworks such as Core Data, Core Animation, etc.
â€¢ Experience with Design Patterns such as MVC, MVVM, etc.
â€¢ Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services
â€¢ Familiarity with 3rd Party API integrations such as Facebook, Dropbox, Instagram, Twitter, GoogleDrive, Bluetooth, Keychain, etc.
â€¢ Design and build applications for the iOS platform

Good to have:
â€¢ Hands-on experience with React Native.
â€¢ A GitHub account with some neat projects in it.
â€¢ Knowledge of any Server-side language is a plus. HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript experience, a plus.

jobs_results.title: IOS Developer (REMOTE)
jobs_results.description:
About the position

Cognizant is seeking an experienced iOS Developer to join their team, focusing on delivering high-quality applications for Apple devices. This role requires a strong background in iOS programming, particularly in Swift and Objective-C, along with project management skills to ensure timely and budget-friendly project delivery. The position can be performed remotely or from Dallas, Texas, and involves collaboration across various departments to translate client visions into functional applications.

Responsibilities
â€¢ Translate the vision of the client into a responsive, bug-free, and reliable app for Apple devices.
,
â€¢ Enable seamless collaboration across various departments, from design to the backend.
,
â€¢ Monitor the performance of the app periodically to always enable optimum performance.
,
â€¢ Write crisp, clean, and effective codes as an iOS developer and programmer.
,
â€¢ Coordinate with senior iOS developers to update them on the progress and status of the iOS application and implement their feedback.
,
â€¢ Define the iOS app features, keeping in mind the scope of work of the iOS developer job profile.
,
â€¢ Continually work towards identifying potential issues and fixing them on the iOS device.
,
â€¢ Full involvement in the complete lifecycle of the iOS development stage, from design, testing, fixing and beyond.
,
â€¢ Work towards maintaining the quality, usability and responsiveness of the application.
,
â€¢ Adapt to the fast-paced innovation in the iOS development world.

Requirements
â€¢ Bachelor's degree in computer science, engineering, or a related field.
,
â€¢ Minimum 6 years of experience working as an iOS developer.
,
â€¢ Proficiency in iOS, be it Objective-C or Swift development.
,
â€¢ Experience working with iOS frameworks and an understanding of Apple design frameworks.
,
â€¢ Ability to identify and resolve problems as an iOS programmer.

Nice-to-haves

Benefits
â€¢ Medical/Dental/Vision/Life Insurance
,
â€¢ Paid holidays plus Paid Time Off
,
â€¢ 401(k) plan and contributions
,
â€¢ Long-term/Short-term Disability
,
â€¢ Paid Parental Leave
,
â€¢ Employee Stock Purchase Plan

jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Developer | *Dev Agency / Consultancy Experience Required
jobs_results.description:
HIRING: Senior iOS Developer | *Dev Agency / Consultancy Experience Required

NOTE: This client is unable to offer sponsorship or visa transfers at this time. Thanks!

RECRUITER OVERVIEW:

Hey, I'm Will â€” Rumor has it I'm Colorado's #1 Most Bald-est ðŸ‘¨ðŸ¦² #DevRecruiterâ„¢. As a well respected agency software engineering recruiter, my team and I are actively and continually partnered with an ever-growing rolodex of private & public tech companies, as well as VC backed startups, Pre-Seed through Acquisition/IPO...ðŸš€ What these companies have in common is that they ALL are looking to Hire "Uncommonly Good" Founding, Mid, Senior, Lead, Staff & Principal Software Devs ... and of course, the Leaders of these Software Development Teams.

A LITTLE BIT ABOUT THIS SPECIFIC CLIENT:

This client is a remote 1st software and design consultancy, 15+ years in business and growing rapidly. They currently have a team of ~50 and they have grown 51% in the past 2 years, with a steady upward trajectory. They recently closed 2 new MAJOR, long-term healthcare projects in the mix (and have many many more in queue), they are looking to build and grow the core internal development team.

A LITTLE BIT ABOUT YOU / REQUIREMENTS:

My client is looking for folks who bring the following to the table:
â€¢ Deep Client Services AKA Consulting AKA Dev Agency experience: Our client is a product development consultancy, so to hit the ground running you must have similar experience.
â€¢ Past Freelance / Project Experience: They love hiring folks who have been client facing and understand the sales and product development cycle in a hands-on way.
â€¢ Strong Healthcare Experience: Our client works as a vendor for 6 of the biggest health systems in the US, so you must be able to "talk the talk" in front of them, i.e. build rapport & trust & ensure that they feel strongly about the company with you leading their projects.
â€¢ Notable iOS / Swift Expertise: They are looking for someone who understands and has worked across the iOS development ecosystem (Xcode, Swift, SwiftUI, TestFlight, etc) and who also can show examples of published apps in the App Store that you either collaborated on or built independently.

LOCATION

Our client is a remote 1st company: If hired, you will work fully remote from anywhere in the US: As an agency/client facing role, please note that the roles MAY require occasional travel across the US. They also generally work core hours of ~8- 4 Mountain Time.

SALARY

The target salary range for this position is $120,000 - $180,000, plus a strong benefits package.

NEXT STEPS...

If you feel that your background and goals align with this role, please drop your resume here. If there is synergy, we will reach out ASAP.

Cheers,

-Will

NOTE: This client is unable to offer sponsorship or visa transfers at this time. If you are interested and qualified after reviewing ALL of the requirements carefully, please submit your resume via LinkedIn and do not send any further personal messages. Rest assured, your application WILL be reviewed for a potential fit along with all other resumes via the applicant reviewing portal, and we WILL move forward with the best fitting candidates. Due to an overwhelming amount of AI generated and SPAM messages via email and LinkedIn, personal messages are now being disregarded. Thanks!

____________________________________________

Will Wegert â€” Colorado's #1 Most Bald-est ðŸ‘¨ðŸ¦² #DevRecruiterâ„¢ | AKA Colorado's most Reliable, Respected, and Recognised Software Engineering Recruiter.

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
We are looking for a strong front end engineer to become a key member of the team. As the ideal candidate, you can show us a few native iOS mobile apps that you have built and deployed.

An understanding of the user centered design process is a plus.

YOU MUST BE ABLE TO:

- Design and develop mobile applications with iOS
- Build and deploy an app natively with Xcode
- Build intuitive UI's for mobile applications
- Implement location-based services and push notifications
- Use a variety of third party SDKs and APIs (e.g. Google Maps and Analytics, Urban Airship, etc.)
- Integrate with proprietary backend REST-based APIs

This is your opportunity to make a significant contribution to a game-changing company, and to share with us your expertise and knowledge in the process.

If you're driven, passionate, and an excellent team player, please drop us a line and tell us why you're the perfect fit for this role.

This job is located in Mountain View, CA. We are accepting intern, part-time, and full-time candidates for this role, as long as you meet the job requirements. No agencies please.

Disclaimer: the above statements are intended to describe the general nature and level of work being performed by individuals assigned to this position. They are not intended to be construed as an exhaustive list of responsibilities, duties and skills required of personnel so classified.

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
Company Description

About IDEXCEL, INC

Idexcel is a global staffing and IT services organization, with a mission to bring great people and great organizations together. Our diverse client base represents a wide range of industries, including technology, telecom, insurance, healthcare, manufacturing, banking & financial services, food & commodities trading and federal organizations. Our teams of experienced recruiters directly work with client companies seeking exceptional people to help with their business initiatives.

Idexcel, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, disability, military status, national origin or any other characteristic protected under federal, state, or applicable local law.

Job Description

Description

Requires a bachelor's degree in area of specialty and at least 6 years of experience in the field or in a related area.

At least 3+ years of strong experience developing and delivering mobile apps for iOS devices.

Experience developing apps and building solutions based on Apple iOS and relevant technologies

Expert in Objective-C

Expert in XCode

Advanced in Swift

Strong knowledge of JSON, XML, HTTPS and relevant protocols

Experience required in the following areas:

Instruments (troubleshooting performance issues, memory leaks, etc.)

Core animations and transitions

Unit testing using Swift

Background processing

Web technologies such as AJAX, JavaScript, HTML5

Solid understanding of software development best practices and design patterns

Sound knowledge of mobile technologies, information security and enterprise-level app capabilities

Experience working on serverless mobile applications a plus

Knowledge on how to integrate with social media platforms a plus

Primary Skill: iOS development using Objective C, Swift and XCode

Additional Information

Thanks & Regards,

SR.IT Recruiter

Dhamotharan

571-267-4164
